phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
In search of the magic stone, Asta and the others arrived at the Underwater Temple,
where they were forced to participate in High Priest Gifso's game, the Temple Battle Royale.
my temple mages would be more powerful than intermediate knights!
Do not think I am going to get discouraged just because I am surrounded by water.
Magna and Luck also participated in the game, hoping to get the magic stone.
Well, well, are not you lively?
My son is the strongest mage of the Underwater Temple!
He is definitely the strongest one here.
You two should come at me at once.
I would rather not hurt you any more than I need to.
Water Creation Magic: Sea God's Hammer!
You are not ending anyone, you bastard!
I am not done having fun yet!
The one who appeared before Magna and Luck
was one of the Eye of the Midnight Sun's top brass, Vetto.
Looks like you are having fun.
Why do not you let us join in?
The Pointlessly Direct Fireball and the Wild Lightning
Oh, it is a full moon tonight.
I wonder if Asta is looking up at the same moon right now.
Not even good for a warm-up.
You are just a pack of mice.
I know we were all on vacation, but there were a number of senior Magic Knights here!
And they were all defeated by one guy...
What were the Magic Knights we believed in so much all about, then?
Where did this macho dude suddenly come from?
Aw, that shark guy was my prey.
This guy's magic power is greater than Captain Yami's.
You made it through the rough ocean currents
and then forced your way in here...
That is some incredible magic, all right.
I guess you can still move.
I am pretty sure you are not a Magic Knight.
What brings you to the Underwater Temple?
We are after the same thing as those two over there, the magic stone.
But it is not like I am just going to hand it over.
Oh, I do not expect you to just hand it over.
We are going to lay waste to everyone here, make you despair, and seize it!
Well, you are all rather rude, abrupt guests.
Could you head on home now?
That is also a pretty rude way to address someone.
If you want to get your way,
do something about it, and hit me with all your magic.
Looks like you are completely underestimating me.
I may not look like it, but I am the strongest in the Underwater Temple.
Water Creation Magic: Sea God's Hammer!
It did not even faze him.
That is not a bad spell, for a mouse.
Let me give you a reward.
This world is all about the survival of the fittest.
The strongest beasts survive, and the weak vermin live only to become prey!
Did you get a good feel for how vastly different our powers are?
You insects are not even allowed to hold on to hope.
The temple's greatest warrior, Gio, is being defeated so easily.
I have never seen anything like this.
Hurry up and get me in there.
But who in the world is this man?
He is one of the leaders of a nasty terror group called the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun?
I do not have time to explain.
We are short on time, so hurry it up.
We cannot leave here until the game is over.
I cannot even undo the spell.
Those are the rules of my magic.
Then I will just let myself out.
Once you are trapped in my spatial magic,
no matter who you are, you will not be able to escape.
The mana tells me you are here.
Stay there and watch for a while.
You are going to be my main dish...
After I season you with despair, as you watch all of your friends die!
If he gets out, the temple's done for.
Can you make it so they hear us out there?
But what are you going to do?
Someone really dangerous just crashed the game.
He is one of the leaders of the Eye of the Midnight Sun,
and a beast of a man strong enough to go head-to-head with a Magic Knight Captain.
Also, three of his underlings are over there, too.
Hurry up and hand over that yummy-looking food...
Due to reasons, I cannot go over there.
Meaning you guys got to do something about him.
All of you, surpass your limits, right here, right now.
If you die, I will kill you.
I never thought the game could get so exciting.
It is a game that will determine the fate of the Underwater Temple, blast it!
To clear the game, defeat the Eye of the Midnight Sun's team.
Those who contribute to clearing the game
will get any wish that is within my power to grant!
There is an absolute monster here...
That makes him worth fighting even more!
I am going to do this, damn it!
I guess we will have to put our match on hold.
Who said you could move on to the next?
We are still alive, you know.
After what Mister Yami said, I cannot just lie here napping.
The more stubborn the prey, the better it is when they are finally in despair!
Well, we managed to get back up,
but how the hell are we supposed to fight that monster?
If he lands even one more decent blow on us, we are finished...
Hit us with another one of those.
We just barely managed to block that attack, and we both still took a ton of damage!
I will keep giving you despair...
That spell leaves a split-second opening right after you attack.
So you are already matching my pace.
You have got good speed and sharp senses, I will give you that!
My Thunderbolt Destruction did not work at all!
I will play with you for a while!
Is this the guy who is called the Smiling Combat Fiend and Luck the Cheery Berserker?
I need to show him who is boss.
Nice to meet you, too, loser.
Ever since I joined the squad, he was an annoying pest who messed with me constantly.
This dude's got some serious issues.
Even on our missions, he would do insane things.
It is the Crackling Magna Typhoon!
I had no choice but to admit that he has great battle instincts.
And since that dungeon mission, he is gotten even stronger.
I hate to say it, but you are my best friend.
Do not you dare leave me behind, you dumbass!
I am going to crush it over here!
When I first met you, I underestimated you.
They told me, This guy's going to be dangerous, yet interesting.
You interested me so much that I kept messing with you.
That pudding you were saving sure was delicious.
That is going to be your last supper!
You always struck back at me with everything you had.
That you are my very first friend.
I bet you have got even more in you!
Who are you calling a gangster?!
That is enough playtime, do not you think?
We are just about warmed up, too!
How can you tell when you cannot even sense mana?
I cannot sense mana, but I can sense ki.
It is true that I sense a strong magical power up ahead.
I have never felt anything like it before!
But as you said, we have got to do this!
It was hard to sense your presence.
Oh, by dancing, I unconsciously put myself into a trance.
When I am in that state, my body moves without me even having to think.
Then my opponents cannot predict my movements.
I have got a clear view of that magic now!
Flame and lightning magic are fighting!
It must be Magna and Luck!
Their opponent has huge magic and...
It is like hundreds of raging beasts!
Wait, you can tell all that?
My tribe's eyes are good at picking up magic.
But if this is who we are up against...
Those two are crazy, but when it comes down to it, they are both super reliable!
The weak get eaten, and all they have left is despair.
Like we have time for that, you dumbass!
We would be too embarrassed to act like his superiors again!
that if we fight him normally, we probably will not stand a chance.
That slight opening we have right after he attacks...
We will hit him with all the magic we have got!
A simultaneous, full-power, body and soul attack at close range?!
Is this what they were trying to do?
Combo Magic: Flame Lightning Explosive Cannon!
Put a little more umph into it, damn it!
Today, we are going to show you how you can do an easy Crackling Magna Typhoon at home.
First, have a string of lightning ready.
Then, you wrap that lightning string around Magna, like this.
Oh, you will have to get your own Magna.
They cannot do that, damn it!
Once you wrap the lightning string around him,
you are going to spin him with all your strength like a top.
And that is the Crackling Magna Typhoon.
You are the only one who can do this, damn it!
I will never give up, no matter how powerful my enemy is!
Black Clover, Page 45: The Guy Who Does not Know When to Quit.
Page 45 The Guy Who Does not Know When to Quit
Not giving up is my magic!
